scripts.test: psql test_bookmarks < db/bookmarks_schema.sql &> /dev/null && mocha --compilers js:babel-register test/*/*.js*
scripts.localtest: createdb test_bookmarks && psql test_bookmarks < db/bookmarks_schema.sql &> /dev/null && mocha --compilers js:babel-register test/*/*.js*; dropdb test_bookmarks
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run mkdir && npm run build:html && npm run build:css && npm run build:img && npm run build:js
scripts.watch: npm run watch:html & npm run watch:css & npm run watch:img & npm run watch:js
scripts.build:html: npm run clean:html && cp public/index.html public/build/
scripts.watch:html: npm run build:html && chokidar public/index.html -c 'npm run build:html'
scripts.build:css: npm run clean:css && lessc --source-map public/css/index.less public/build/$npm_package_name.$npm_package_version.css && cp public/css/reset.css public/build/
scripts.watch:css: npm run build:css && chokidar 'public/css/**/*.less' -c 'npm run build:css'
scripts.build:img: npm run clean:img && cp -r public/img/ public/build/img/
